title: About
text1: Companies offsetting CO2 emissions with carbon credits need to procure high-quality carbon, or risk accusations of greenwashing. A common approach is to trust in centralized carbon registries (e.g. Verra, Gold Standard) but blind trust in brand names has proven to be a poor guarantee of quality.
text2: Lynx utilizes satellite remote-sensing and blockchain technologies to digitize the supply-side of carbon credits, providing traceability for each tonne of CO2 back to the source, empowering auditors, increasing buyer trust, and reducing the need for costly manual monitoring and verification.
